resources.string: Please, set the custom work and break time below:
To restart pomodoro timer, hold about 3 seconds

Timer Manager app has been developed by Ant Technologies created by Baku Higher Oil School students. The aim of the application is helping users focus on their work and preventing further distraction. Worldwide popular Pomodoro technique was utilized to perform that goal. According to Pomodoro method, work is divided into intervals that comprise traditionally 25 minutes and separated by normally 5 minutes short breaks.
Dreams don’t work unless you do.
When you play, play hard; when you work, don’t play at all.
Most people give up when they are about to achieve success.
You’re never a loser until you quit trying.
Someday is not a day of the week.
One day you will thank yourself for never giving up.
Get yourself a cup of coffee.
